thread.title: It's the place you would always want to stay in NYC
thread.title_full: It's the place you would always want to stay in NYC - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: charitylagahid
title: It's the place you would always want to stay in NYC
text: I've been here quite a lot for the past two years. The staff have always been consistent from then until now. They will have the warmest greetings when you come, they are also pretty much initiative to help you. While checking in, they have some munchies and refreshing drinks in the lobby to suffice ones need after the travel. The rooms are really cozy and beds are perfect - not to hard, not to soft. Location wise, it's a 10-15 minute walk from Rockefeller and half an hour to time square. You've got Panda Express round the block and some Duane reade which opens 24/7 on the other end. Love this place ❤️
